body:
New package added for the Arm Performance Libraries (ArmPL) implementation of BLAS, LAPACK and FFTW.

Only works on Arm hardware - and depends upon the `Arm` package install, no source code install, just wraps the existing 'arm' install to provide multiple variants. 

Designed to replicate the style of OpenBLAS.
title: armpl: New package added for ArmPL
